title: Merge Face
description: Replace the face in this image with another face
uploadInstructions: Upload a clear image with a visible face. The image will be optimized automatically.
error: Face merge failed. Please try again.
invalidFile: Please upload a valid image file (JPG, PNG, WebP).
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Please upload an image smaller than 10MB.
noFaceDetected: No face detected in the uploaded image. Please try another image.
dragDropHere: Drag & drop an image here or click to select
